name: Ezamur
description:
Ezamur is a challenging platformer that consists of 4 stages each with it's own set of gimmicks and unique boss fights. It's also a demo/prequel to my next upcoming game.

General controls:

Shift: Select/Jump/Slide

Left/Right Arrow: Movement

Down Arrow: Crouch

Esc/P: Pause

Made by Andrey Kuzin, Arthur Ogorodnikov and Mikhail Kabanov.

Wanna leave a feedback? PM me on Discord: Po4ti#1862

Version 1.0.1:

* Beans now show their hitbox on tutorial screen

* Fixed quick kill issues on boss 2

* Nerfed several saves on stage 3

* Added new sounds on stage 3 and boss 3

* Gameover screen now shows above everything

* GUI text now shows actual buttons

* Added predictors on some attack on boss 4

* Fixed not being able to teleport back from boss 4
